name: Election 2016 io (opoly)
description:
The 2016 presidential election campaign has already started! The United States presidential election of 2016 is to be held on Tuesday, November 8, 2016. Join the debate on election predictions, news, issues and candidates by playing the Election 2016 io game. Add your photo(s), change your cards to match the dynamic changes in the election, and play hard!

Optional Game Features:

* 2D/2.5D/3D play modes
* Customize your player cards
* Change player names
* Increase or decrease the amount of money played in the game
